info.name: Google Analytics Dark Black - DestructiveBurn
info.description:
Google Analytics is nice to keep an eye on the traffic of your site. A dark version just makes everything much better to the eye.

V: 1.0.0.4 Feb, 22/2018 SearchBar Fixed

IF YOU HAVE AN ISSUE PLEASE TAKE A PICTURE AND WHAT PAGE THE PICTURE IS ON.  THIS INFORMATION HELPS ME TO GET IT FIXED FAST.   SENDING ME MESSAGES THAT SOMETHING IS BROKEN DOES NOT HELP FIND THE PROBLEM.  THANKS.
